name: slither-esn-data-collector
description: Browser extension for collecting ESN training data from Slither.io
author: Niccol√≤ Pagano

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm run validate
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/popup dist/content dist/background dist/icons
scripts.copy-files: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp popup/* dist/popup/ && cp content/* dist/content/ && cp background/* dist/background/ && cp icons/*.png dist/icons/
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run pack
